availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Son of William Elliott and Eliza Fowkes Elliot. Married to Nancy O'Neal in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on January 13, 1847. Father of John William Elliott, Eliza Fowke Elliott, and Nancy Eliza Elliott. Married to Annie C. Van Orten Elliott in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on May 16, 1855. Father of Edwin J. Elliott, Nellie Elliott, Katie Elliott, Hattie Elliott, Robert J. Elliott, Jr., and Annie Elliott. Graduate of Transylvania University in Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1846. Admitted to the bar in 1847. Attorney in Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Notary Public in Louisville in 1862.
